DOC.brief_summary: A feasibility study monitor record gastrointestinal ( GI ) myoelectric activity subject suspect diagnosed irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) report GI pain asymptomatic subject without IBS GI pain .
DOC.brief_title: Gastrointestinal Myoelectric Activity Protocol , G-Tech EEnG Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: This single-arm , non-randomized feasibility study design transcutaneously detect monitor myoelectric intestinal signal temporally associate symptoms patient report pain suspect diagnosed IBS , control [ subject without suspect IBS diagnosis IBS prior and/or current complaint pain ] .
DOC.criteria: General Eligibility Criteria : General Inclusion Criteria Willing able provide inform consent ; Eighteen ( 18 ) year age old ; Willing able follow specify study procedure regimen ; No know allergy commercially available food drink require specify study procedure regimen ; Willing able recline remain still recording . General Exclusion Criteria Subject implantable device pacemaker , defibrillator , nerve stimulator , insulin pump , automatic analgesic pump , automate implant medical device ; Known allergy isopropyl ( rub ) alcohol ; Known allergy Ag/AgCl electrode ; Known allergy glue adhesive ( electrode adhesive ) ; Dietary restriction permit intake food drink require protocol ; Dietary restriction permit four ( 4 ) hour fast period prior start myoelectric recording ; Subject pregnant suspect pregnancy ; Open sores wound abdomen ; Any injury around area electrode placement would cause pain gentle pressure require electrode lead wire placement ; Weight > 300 lb ( 136 Kg ) ( excess weight interfere quality signal ) . IBS With Complaints GI Pain Eligibility Criteria IBS With Complaints Pain Inclusion Criteria All answer must `` YES '' All Following Inclusion Criteria Prior diagnosis IBS complaint GI pain IBS With Complaints Pain Exclusion Criteria All answer must `` NO '' All Following Exclusion Criteria Functional dyspepsia ; No report GI pain , past present . Control Subjects Eligibility Criteria Subjects NOT prior diagnosis functional GI disorder Control Subjects Inclusion Criteria All answer must `` YES '' All Following Inclusion Criteria No prior diagnosis IBS ; No complaint GI pain . Control Subjects Exclusion Criteria All answer must `` NO '' All Following Exclusion Criteria Current diagnosis GI disorder ; Current recent complaint GI pain .
